text: B.01.008.2 (1) The label of a prepackaged product that contains an added sugar or sweetener shall show, grouped in a list, the common names of those sugars and sweeteners in descending order of their proportion of the prepackaged product. (2) The list referred to in subsection (1) shall be shown in the list of ingredients in parentheses after the common name of the added sugars or sweeteners.
